author: julianfoad
msg: Clarify the semantics of file locking.
Discuss how moving, renaming, deleting and copying are affected.

author: pmayweg
msg: (SVNClient::getVersionInfo): Remove senseless statement, which bugs gcc.

author: maxb
msg: Yet more buildsystem/testsystem simplification. Dispose of run-*-tests.py, and
just run the appropriate tests directly. Incidentally, re-enable changes-test,
which was erroneously not being run.
* build.conf: Remove the run-*-tests.py script references, and un-skip the

author: maxb
msg: Teach win-tests.py to fetch the lists of tests directly from build.conf,
rather than having hardcoded lists of its own.
* build.conf (test-scripts): List utf8_tests.py - it is Windows only, but the
* win-tests.py: Remove the hardcoded test lists, and use the build generator
system to find the info from build.conf.
_extension_map definition for Windows, but no more customizations.
For use when a simple Windows-oriented parse of build.conf is desired,
but the probing for dependency versions is not, i.e. in win-tests.py.
